mapper.insert: insert into tb_question_board(num, email, title, content, comment_group_code) values (seq_question_board_num.nextval, #{email}, #{title}, #{content}, seq_comment_num.nextVal)
mapper.select: select c.* from tb_question_board q,tb_comment c where q.comment_group_code = c.comment_group_code and q.num = #{num}
